HOME.description: Welcome to MiYou – Where we focus on your results!

ABOUT.title: Who are we?
ABOUT.intro: We are Milana and Youri, the faces behind MiYou. We are currently both studying Software Development at an MBO level 4 program. Our goal is to turn our passion for technology and creativity into beautiful and functional websites.
ABOUT.mission: With MiYou, we focus on supporting individuals and small businesses that want to grow online. Whether you need a simpler website or something more complex, we’ll think along with you and deliver a result you can be proud of!

STEP1.title: Send us a message
STEP1.explanation: Fill out the contact form below and we will contact you as soon as possible!

STEP2.title: We schedule an appointment
STEP2.explanation: Together, we look at what you need and set a time to review everything in detail

STEP3.title: Time to get to work
STEP3.explanation: We translate your ideas into a stylish, well-functioning website — exactly how you want it!
